name: Duality (WIP)
description:
Two characters are trapped in a dungeon, and must work together to escape. Each character is on their own side of the dungeon, and doors and paths must be opened for them by the other character. You can move with WASD, jump with Space, and change character with the 1 and 2 keys.

This game is still a work in progress and isn't fully playable from start to finish.
